data.message: I saw your coca cola sample distributers for coke zero dump the bagged bottles from a big red coca cola 'recycle here' wheely bin straight into general waste... Looks like this new ad is doing the same thing. You're clearly very good at 'looking' like you're doing your bit, but the evidence is clear, you are only contributing more and more to the polluting of our earth.

replies.message: Hi Emma-Lou, thanks for getting in touch. Could you please PM us with the details so we can investigate? Thanks
